name: Za Loopo!
description:
To play this game normally open it in fullscreen.

The events take place in some far away future in which evil living homophobic balloons began hunting down innocent gay people. The boss and creator of evil balloons had manipulated time and space and became immortal thanks to his ZA LOOPO! power. He had stolen our main characters girlfriend, so our samurai robot girl is chasing him while fighting other evil balloons, trying to kick the boss’s butt, save the other gays and most importantly her loved one.
